major_arcana.name: The Fool
major_arcana.meaning: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, a free spirit. The Fool represents unlimited potential and the journey ahead.

major_arcana.name: The Magician
major_arcana.meaning: Manifestation, resourcefulness, power, skill. The Magician represents the power to transform reality and manifest desires.

major_arcana.name: The High Priestess
major_arcana.meaning: Intuition, unconscious knowledge, divine feminine, mystery. The High Priestess represents hidden knowledge and spiritual insight.

major_arcana.name: The Empress
major_arcana.meaning: Femininity, beauty, nature, abundance, fertility. The Empress represents creation, beauty, and the nurturing aspects of the universe.

major_arcana.name: The Emperor
major_arcana.meaning: Authority, structure, control, stability, fatherhood. The Emperor represents structure, power, and established order.

major_arcana.name: The Hierophant
major_arcana.meaning: Tradition, conformity, morality, ethics, spiritual wisdom. The Hierophant represents religious beliefs and conformity to tradition.

major_arcana.name: The Lovers
major_arcana.meaning: Love, harmony, relationships, choices, alignment. The Lovers represent relationships and choices based on values.

major_arcana.name: The Chariot
major_arcana.meaning: Willpower, determination, action, control, victory. The Chariot represents overcoming conflicts and moving forward in harmony.

major_arcana.name: Strength
major_arcana.meaning: Courage, strength, patience, compassion, inner power. Strength represents inner strength, compassion, and courage.

major_arcana.name: The Hermit
major_arcana.meaning: Soul-searching, introspection, inner guidance, solitude. The Hermit represents introspection, searching for truth, and inner guidance.

major_arcana.name: Wheel of Fortune
major_arcana.meaning: Cycles, fate, turning points, luck, destiny. The Wheel represents the cyclical nature of life and destiny.

major_arcana.name: Justice
major_arcana.meaning: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law. Justice represents fairness, truth, and the law of cause and effect.

major_arcana.name: The Hanged Man
major_arcana.meaning: Surrender, letting go, new perspective, enlightenment. The Hanged Man represents surrender, sacrifice, and seeing things differently.

major_arcana.name: Death
major_arcana.meaning: Transformation, endings, change, transition, rebirth. Death represents transformation, endings, and new beginnings.

major_arcana.name: Temperance
major_arcana.meaning: Balance, moderation, patience, purpose, alchemy. Temperance represents balance, moderation, and harmony.

major_arcana.name: The Devil
major_arcana.meaning: Bondage, addiction, materialism, playfulness, shadow self. The Devil represents bondage, addiction, and exploring the shadow self.

major_arcana.name: The Tower
major_arcana.meaning: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, awakening. The Tower represents sudden change, upheaval, and revelation.

major_arcana.name: The Star
major_arcana.meaning: Hope, faith, purpose, renewal, spirituality. The Star represents hope, inspiration, and renewal.

major_arcana.name: The Moon
major_arcana.meaning: Illusion, fear, anxiety, subconscious, intuition. The Moon represents illusions, anxiety, and the subconscious.

major_arcana.name: The Sun
major_arcana.meaning: Joy, success, celebration, positivity, vitality. The Sun represents joy, success, and vitality.

major_arcana.name: Judgment
major_arcana.meaning: Judgment, rebirth, inner calling, absolution. Judgment represents judgment, rebirth, and inner calling.

major_arcana.name: The World
major_arcana.meaning: Completion, integration, accomplishment, travel, fulfillment. The World represents completion, integration, and accomplishment.

wands.name: Ace of Wands
wands.meaning: Inspiration, new opportunities, growth, potential. The seed of a new venture or creative project.

wands.name: Two of Wands
wands.meaning: Future planning, progress, decisions, discovery. Standing at a crossroads with world at your feet.

wands.name: Three of Wands
wands.meaning: Expansion, foresight, overseas opportunities, collaboration. Looking to the future with confidence.

wands.name: Four of Wands
wands.meaning: Celebration, harmony, marriage, home, community. A time of stability, happiness, and celebration.

wands.name: Five of Wands
wands.meaning: Conflict, disagreements, competition, tension. Struggles that lead to growth and change.

wands.name: Six of Wands
wands.meaning: Victory, success, public recognition, progress, self-confidence. Achieving victory and recognition.

wands.name: Seven of Wands
wands.meaning: Perseverance, defensive, protecting position, asserting beliefs. Standing up for your beliefs.

wands.name: Eight of Wands
wands.meaning: Movement, travel, speed, sudden changes, quick decisions. Rapid movement and swift change.

wands.name: Nine of Wands
wands.meaning: Resilience, courage, persistence, test of faith, boundaries. The final test before victory.

wands.name: Ten of Wands
wands.meaning: Burden, extra responsibility, hard work, completion, accomplishment. Carrying a heavy load.

wands.name: Page of Wands
wands.meaning: Exploration, excitement, freedom, youthful energy, message. The spark of an idea or opportunity.

wands.name: Knight of Wands
wands.meaning: Energy, passion, adventure, impulsiveness, free spirit. Charging ahead with passion.

wands.name: Queen of Wands
wands.meaning: Courage, confidence, independence, social butterfly, determination. A charismatic, confident leader.

wands.name: King of Wands
wands.meaning: Natural-born leader, vision, entrepreneur, honor, big picture. A charismatic, visionary leader.

cups.name: Ace of Cups
cups.meaning: New feelings, spirituality, intuition, love. The beginning of emotional or spiritual fulfillment.

cups.name: Two of Cups
cups.meaning: Unity, partnership, connection, mutual attraction. The start of a new relationship or partnership.

cups.name: Three of Cups
cups.meaning: Celebration, friendship, creativity, collaborations. Joyful gatherings and celebrations.

cups.name: Four of Cups
cups.meaning: Meditation, contemplation, apathy, reevaluation. A period of introspection and contemplation.

cups.name: Five of Cups
cups.meaning: Loss, grief, disappointment, regret, focus on the negative. Dealing with loss and disappointment.

cups.name: Six of Cups
cups.meaning: Reunion, nostalgia, childhood memories, innocence. Reconnecting with the past or childhood.

cups.name: Seven of Cups
cups.meaning: Choices, illusions, fantasy, wishful thinking. Many options and possibilities.

cups.name: Eight of Cups
cups.meaning: Walking away, disillusionment, leaving behind, search for truth. Abandoning something to seek deeper meaning.

cups.name: Nine of Cups
cups.meaning: Contentment, satisfaction, gratitude, wish fulfilled. The wish card - satisfaction and contentment.

cups.name: Ten of Cups
cups.meaning: Divine love, blissful relationships, harmony, alignment. Perfect happiness and emotional fulfillment.

cups.name: Page of Cups
cups.meaning: Creative opportunities, intuitive messages, curiosity, dreamer. A messenger of creativity and intuition.

cups.name: Knight of Cups
cups.meaning: Romance, charm, imagination, beauty, following the heart. The romantic and charming suitor.

cups.name: Queen of Cups
cups.meaning: Compassion, calm, comfort, emotional security, intuition. The nurturing, intuitive counselor.

cups.name: King of Cups
cups.meaning: Emotional balance, compassion, diplomacy, counselor. The emotionally balanced and compassionate advisor.

swords.name: Ace of Swords
swords.meaning: Breakthrough, clarity, sharp mind, truth. A moment of brilliant insight or clear understanding.

swords.name: Two of Swords
swords.meaning: Difficult choices, indecision, stalemate, blocked emotions. At a crossroads, unable to decide.

swords.name: Three of Swords
swords.meaning: Heartbreak, emotional pain, sorrow, grief, betrayal. Painful separation and heartache.

swords.name: Four of Swords
swords.meaning: Rest, restoration, contemplation, recuperation, mental recharge. A time for rest and recuperation.

swords.name: Five of Swords
swords.meaning: Conflict, tension, defeat, winning at all costs, betrayal. Winning a battle but losing the war.

swords.name: Six of Swords
swords.meaning: Transition, change, rite of passage, releasing baggage. Moving away from difficulty to calmer waters.

swords.name: Seven of Swords
swords.meaning: Betrayal, deception, getting away with something, stealth. Taking risks and possibly being deceitful.

swords.name: Eight of Swords
swords.meaning: Restriction, confusion, powerlessness, victim mentality. Feeling trapped and restricted.

swords.name: Nine of Swords
swords.meaning: Anxiety, worry, fear, depression, nightmares. Dealing with worry and anxiety.

swords.name: Ten of Swords
swords.meaning: Painful endings, deep wounds, betrayal, loss, crisis. Hitting rock bottom, the end of a cycle.

swords.name: Page of Swords
swords.meaning: Curiosity, restlessness, mental energy, vigilance. A curious, watchful energy, gathering information.

swords.name: Knight of Swords
swords.meaning: Ambition, action, assertiveness, aggression. Charging ahead with intellectual pursuits.

swords.name: Queen of Swords
swords.meaning: Independent, unbiased judgment, clear boundaries, perceptive. The sharp, perceptive judge.

swords.name: King of Swords
swords.meaning: Mental clarity, intellectual power, authority, truth. The intellectual authority and judge.

pentacles.name: Ace of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: New financial opportunity, prosperity, manifestation. The seed of material gain and abundance.

pentacles.name: Two of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Balance, adaptability, time management, prioritization. Juggling resources and responsibilities.

pentacles.name: Three of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Teamwork, collaboration, learning, implementation. Working together to achieve a common goal.

pentacles.name: Four of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Conservation, frugality, security, possessiveness. Holding tightly to resources and security.

pentacles.name: Five of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Financial loss, poverty, isolation, worry. Experiencing hardship and feeling left out in the cold.

pentacles.name: Six of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Generosity, charity, giving, receiving, sharing wealth. Sharing resources and giving to others.

pentacles.name: Seven of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Patience, reward, investment, long-term view. Assessing progress and waiting for results.

pentacles.name: Eight of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Apprenticeship, education, skill development, craftsmanship. Dedication to craft and skill-building.

pentacles.name: Nine of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Luxury, self-sufficiency, financial independence, rewards. Enjoying the fruits of your labor.

pentacles.name: Ten of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Wealth, family, establishment, retirement, abundance. Legacy, family wealth, and long-term success.

pentacles.name: Page of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Manifestation, financial opportunity, skill development. A messenger of practical opportunity.

pentacles.name: Knight of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Hard work, productivity, routine, conservatism. The diligent, reliable worker.

pentacles.name: Queen of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Nurturing, practical, providing financially, comfortable. The nurturing provider and practical caretaker.

pentacles.name: King of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Abundance, prosperity, security, leadership, provider. The wealthy, successful provider and leader.
